title: Good job on Akali changes Filthiot Games
body:
I still remember the day Crescent Slash was made to detonate marks. I posted a thread specifically outlining how dumb that change was and had inferior below diamond peasants whittle me down and disagree with me. I take this as a clear sign Riot does not balance around pro play, but to cater to the peasant majority(those below diamond) who pay for skins and go 'we peh we seh lel im silver in elo hell mi term suks'.

Wait, why am I posting it here? Rioters here are peasants who take orders from NA and Tencent. Oh well...

Akali is such an odd champ. She doesn't have burst, its just high constant dps which is rather bad for an assassin. 

She is so binary and a stat check. Do you have X stat? No? she kills you. You do? she doesn't kill you and she is useless. she doesn't have any variance. It's either blow someone up with high dps or you are useless, hence calling her binary. It is one or the other.
I am trying to find the point to this thread but I don't think there is one.
There isn't really. Looking to provoke some peasants into a state of denial.
